content.rendered:
Mage Monkeys are leading Service Provider for Magento Marketplace development
across the globe. We offer services that help our clients to transform their Magento
store into a successful online marketplace just like Amazon.

acf.heading_title:
Why to choose Mage Monkeys for
Magento Marketplace Development?

services_repeater.title: Dashboard
services_repeater.description: Enriched Dashboard to provide ultimate Magento user experience

services_repeater.title: Registration Page for Vendor
services_repeater.description: With the help of Vendor Registration page seller can easily register their business.

services_repeater.title: Verification of Vendor
services_repeater.description: Hassle-free collection of scanned documents from vendor at the time of registration form.

services_repeater.title: Listing Page for Vendor
services_repeater.description: On the basis of product categories listing of vendors/suppliers is available.

services_repeater.title: Multiple Vendors
services_repeater.description: Same product will be listed under multiple vendors when user searched for the product.

services_repeater.title: Shipping
services_repeater.description: Individual shipping charges can be maintained as per products.

services_repeater.title: Vacation Mode
services_repeater.description: When any of the sellers is not available then they can use the ‘Seller Vacation mode’ to notify the customers.

services_repeater.title: Supports all types of Products
services_repeater.description: Simple and configurable products can be created by supplier that are being supported by Magento

services_repeater.title: Product Approval
services_repeater.description: Approval of products can be done in both ways, either manually or automatically.

services_repeater.title: Enabling/ Disabling of products
services_repeater.description: Products which vendor fells no more to continue can easily disable them and when the products are back in stock can enable them.

services_repeater.title: Real Time Product Statistics
services_repeater.description: Whenever Vendors are disabled/deleted, products automatically gets deleted or de-activated.

services_repeater.title: Import and Export of Bulk Product
services_repeater.description: With the help of CSV file Vendor can easily import and export products.

services_repeater.title: Checkout once with Multiple products
services_repeater.description: Customers can easily purchase multiple products from Sellers or Vendors at once.

services_repeater.title: Approval Notifications
services_repeater.description: Admin can manage notifications related to order. Vendor or product anytime by enabling or disabling them.

services_repeater.title: Templates for Email
services_repeater.description: Email Templates will help in receiving product sold notification email which includes product details.

services_repeater.title: Order and Invoice Management
services_repeater.description: A separate section is available for management of Vendors which includes their avatars, commissions, transactions etc.

services_repeater.title: Commission
services_repeater.description: As per multiple vendors, commission rates can be decided as per Vendors.

services_repeater.title: Commission Management
services_repeater.description: You can set different commission rates for different vendors

services_repeater.title: Payment Report
services_repeater.description: As per individual vendor reports are available with details of credit and debit transactions.

services_repeater.title: Transactions supported Offline
services_repeater.description: Offline transactions for each vendor can be recorded by Admin

services_repeater.title: Communication between Vendor-Customer
services_repeater.description: With the help of this feature, vendor can reach out to customer easily.

services_repeater.title: Reviews Management of Seller/Vendor
services_repeater.description:
When any customer provide feedback related to products then the review of the vendor is being created automatically.

Easy to customize and open source.

As source code is open, crafting as per individual requirement can be managed easily.

services_repeater.title: Compatible with Magento 1 & 2
services_repeater.description: Our Marketplace is compatible with Magento 1,x and 2.x version

services_repeater.title: Other Additional Features
services_repeater.description: Updates related to valuable features with our marketplace development.

content_details.title: Crafting custom marketplace that suits your complex requirements of project goals.
Only Magento certified Developers to work on your projects.

acf.top_title:
Features of Magento Marketplace
Developed at Mage Monkeys
